00197 class IndexOutOfRangeException : public Exception
00198 {
00199 public:
00201     IndexOutOfRangeException()
00202     {}
00209     IndexOutOfRangeException(int where, int lbound, int rbound)
00210     {
00211         std::ostringstream s;
00212         s << "Index out of range (" << lbound << " <= X < " << rbound << "): " << where;
00213         mMessage = s.str();
00214     }
00219     IndexOutOfRangeException(const Context& c) : Exception(c)
00220     {}
00225     IndexOutOfRangeException(const std::string& message) : Exception(message)
00226     {}
00227 
00233     IndexOutOfRangeException(const Throwable& t, const Context& c) : Exception(t, c)
00234     {}
00235 
00237     ~IndexOutOfRangeException()
00238     {}
00239 };
